DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to confirm the findings of an early study and expand our knowledge of treating Malignant Carcinoma in the Breast Tissue Using an ATP (Adenosine-5'-Triphosphate) Inhibitor.
DOC.brief_title: Eradication of Malignant Carcinoma in the Breast Tissue
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis of breast cancer Referred to the study by their treating physician Any type of treatment for breast cancer before starting the study
